item.title: Upgrade | KubeDB
item.description: Upgrading KubeDB This guide will show you how to upgrade KubeDB operator. Here, we are going to show how to update the license and how to upgrade between two KubeDB versions. Updating License KubeDB support updating license without requiring any re-installation or restart. KubeDB creates a Secret named <helm release name>-license with the license file. You just need to update the Secret. The changes will propagate automatically to the operator and it will use the updated license going forward.
